map.title: Mappa della conoscenza
map.subtitle: Una panoramica completa di tutte le categorie, sottocategorie e argomenti
map.errorLoading: Errore durante il caricamento della mappa

banner.title: Impostazioni dei cookie
banner.description: Utilizziamo i cookie per migliorare la tua esperienza, analizzare il traffico del sito e personalizzare i contenuti. Puoi gestire le tue preferenze in qualsiasi momento.
banner.rejectAllAria: Rifiuta tutti i cookie non essenziali
banner.closeWarning: Chiudere senza scegliere rifiuterà tutti i cookie non essenziali.

settings.title: Preferenze dei cookie
settings.description: Scegli quali cookie desideri consentire. Puoi modificare queste impostazioni in qualsiasi momento dal piè di pagina.
settings.closeWarning: La chiusura senza salvare verrà considerata come il rifiuto di tutti i cookie non essenziali.

necessary.name: Cookie necessari
necessary.description: Questi cookie sono essenziali per il corretto funzionamento del sito web. Consentono funzionalità di base come la navigazione delle pagine e l'accesso alle aree protette. Il sito web non può funzionare correttamente senza questi cookie.

functional.name: Cookie funzionali
functional.description: Questi cookie ricordano le tue preferenze e impostazioni, come la selezione della lingua e il tema, per offrirti un'esperienza più personalizzata.

analytics.name: Cookie analitici
analytics.description: Questi cookie ci aiutano a capire come i visitatori utilizzano il nostro sito web raccogliendo e riportando informazioni anonime. Questo ci aiuta a migliorare le prestazioni e l'esperienza utente del sito web.

marketing.name: Cookie di marketing
marketing.description: Questi cookie vengono utilizzati per tracciare i visitatori sui siti web e visualizzare annunci personalizzati. Ci aiutano a misurare l'efficacia delle nostre campagne di marketing.

topSites.title: Siti Top
topSites.subtitle: Lista curata dei migliori siti web per ogni argomento
topSites.selectTopic: Seleziona un argomento per vedere i siti top
topSites.noLinks: Nessun sito disponibile per questo argomento ancora

meta.title: Migliori Siti Spirituali ed Esoterici - Oxyness
meta.description: Scopri i migliori siti spirituali ed esoterici, accuratamente selezionati e classificati per argomento. Trova risorse affidabili per meditazione, metafisica, divinazione, guarigione energetica e altro ancora.

advisors.title: Consulenti Spirituali
advisors.subtitle: Scopri consulenti spirituali e medium affidabili da tutto il mondo
advisors.noResultsMessage: Prova a modificare i criteri di ricerca o riprova più tardi

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Oxyness
meta.description: Oxyness Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. GDPR-compliant privacy policy for our spiritual and esoteric directory.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Oxyness, we understand that your spiritual journey is deeply personal. We are committed to protecting your privacy while you explore spiritual wisdom, connect with advisors, and discover new resources. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights to control your personal data.
introduction.commitment: Your privacy matters to us. We will never sell your personal data to third parties.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.intro: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:
controller.name: Oxyness
controller.note: If you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your personal data, please contact us using the information above.

dataCollected.title: What data we collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect different types of information depending on how you interact with our website:

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Data
automatic.description: When you visit Oxyness, we automatically collect certain technical information:
items: Pages you visit and time spent on each page
Date and time of your visit
Cookie data (see our Cookie Policy for details)

userProvided.title: User-Provided Data
userProvided.description: Currently, Oxyness does not require user accounts or registration. However, in the future we may collect:
items: Contact information (email, name) if you contact us
Reviews and ratings you provide (planned feature)
userProvided.note: We will update this policy and request your consent before implementing any of these features.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: We collect information about how you interact with our website:
usage.privacy: This browsing data is private and is never shared with advisors or third parties. Advisors cannot see who viewed their profiles.

purposes.title: How we use your data
purposes.intro: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

items.title: Website Functionality
items.description: To provide core features of our website, including search, navigation, and personalization (theme, language).

items.title: User Experience Improvement
items.description: To understand how visitors use our website and improve content, layout, and features based on usage patterns.

items.title: Security and Fraud Prevention
items.description: To protect our website from abuse, spam, and malicious activity, and to maintain the security of our systems.

items.title: Analytics and Performance
items.description: To measure website performance, track visitor statistics, and analyze trends (when you consent to analytics cookies).

items.title: Communication
items.description: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support when you contact us.

items.title: Legal Compliance
items.description: To comply with legal obligations, enforce our terms of service, and protect our legal rights.

legal.title: Legal basis for processing
legal.intro: Under GDPR, we must have a legal basis for processing your personal data. We rely on the following:

bases.description: We have a legitimate interest in operating our website, improving user experience, and protecting our systems from abuse. We balance this interest against your privacy rights.
For non-essential cookies and analytics, we ask for your explicit consent. You can withdraw consent at any time through Cookie Settings.
In some cases, we are required by law to process your personal data.
bases.examples: Responding to legal requests, tax compliance

thirdParty.title: Third-party services and data sharing
thirdParty.intro: We may share your data with the following third-party services:

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.purpose: To measure website traffic and understand user behavior
analytics.data: Anonymized IP address, browser information, pages visited, session duration
analytics.location: Data may be transferred to USA (Google's servers)

hosting.title: Hosting Provider
hosting.purpose: To host our website and store server logs
hosting.data: IP addresses, request logs, technical data
hosting.note: Hosting provider has access to server logs as part of infrastructure maintenance

affiliate.title: Affiliate Partners
affiliate.purpose: When you click on advisor website links or other external resources
affiliate.data: Referrer information (that you came from Oxyness)
affiliate.note: Affiliate links help us maintain the website at no cost to you. We may earn a commission if you purchase services through these links.

thirdParty.noSale: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes. Your privacy is not for sale.

retention.title: How long we keep your data
retention.intro: We only keep your personal data for as long as necessary:

periods.details: Consent must be renewed annually. You can delete cookies anytime through Cookie Settings or browser settings.
Technical logs (IP addresses, requests) are automatically deleted after 90 days.
When Google Analytics is implemented, data will be retained for 26 months (default setting).
If you contact us by email, we keep correspondence for 3 years for customer support purposes.

retention.deletion: After these periods, data is automatically deleted or anonymized so it can no longer identify you.

rights.title: Your privacy rights under GDPR
rights.intro: As a user in the European Union, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.description: You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.
You can ask us to correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

items.right: Right to Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten')
items.description: You can request that we delete your personal data in certain circumstances.
You can ask us to temporarily stop processing your personal data.
You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format to transfer to another service.
You can object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing purposes.
items.how: Contact us at privacy@oxyness.com or use Cookie Settings

items.description: For processing based on consent (cookies, analytics), you can withdraw consent at any time.
items.how: Use Cookie Settings in the footer or contact us

items.description: You have the right to file a complaint with your national data protection authority.

rights.response: We will respond to all requests within 30 days as required by GDPR. There is no fee for exercising your rights unless your request is clearly unfounded or excessive.

security.title: How we protect your data
security.intro: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
measures: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
Secure server infrastructure hosted in EU data centers
Access controls and authentication for internal systems
Regular backups to prevent data loss
Privacy by design in all new features
security.note: While we implement strong security measures, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but we work hard to protect your data.

transfers.title: International data transfers
transfers.intro: Your data is primarily stored and processed in the European Union:
transfers.details: Our hosting infrastructure is located in EU data centers, ensuring your data remains within the EU jurisdiction and subject to GDPR protections.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: In the future, when we implement Google Analytics, some data may be transferred to the United States (Google's servers). This transfer will be protected by:
safeguards: Your explicit consent (Analytics cookies must be accepted)
IP anonymization to reduce personal data exposure
Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the EU Commission

transfers.commitment: We will always inform you before implementing any services that transfer data outside the EU and ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

children.title: Children's privacy
children.content: Oxyness is intended for adults (18 years and older). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16 years of age. If you are under 16, please do not use this website or provide any personal information.
children.parents: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us at privacy@oxyness.com and we will delete the information.

business.title: Our business model and transparency
business.intro: We believe in transparency about how we operate:

revenue.title: How we make money
sources: Affiliate links - When you visit advisor websites or purchase services through links on our site, we may earn a commission. This does not affect the price you pay.
Future revenue streams may include premium listings or advertising, which will be clearly marked and require your consent for cookies.

listings.title: Advisor listings
listings.description: All advisor and website listings on Oxyness are currently free. We do not charge advisors to be listed in our directory.
listings.future: If we introduce paid listings in the future, they will be clearly labeled to maintain transparency.

dataSale.title: We do not sell your data
dataSale.description: Your personal data is never sold, rented, or traded to third parties. Your privacy is not a product.

privacy.title: Spiritual content privacy
privacy.description: We understand that exploring spiritual and esoteric topics is personal. Your browsing history, searches, and the advisors you view are private. We do not share this information with advisors, other users, or third parties.

automated.title: Automated decision-making and profiling
automated.content: We do not use automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal effects or similarly significantly affects you. In the future, we may use algorithms to recommend content or advisors based on your interests, but you will always have control over these features.

updates.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
updates.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect:
reasons: Changes in our data practices or services
New legal requirements or regulatory guidance

notification.title: How we notify you
notification.description: When we make material changes, we will:
methods: Display a prominent notice on our website
Update the 'Last updated' date and version number at the top of this policy
Request renewed consent if the changes affect cookie usage or data processing based on consent
Email registered users (when we implement user accounts)

updates.recommendation: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your data.

contact.title: Contact us about privacy
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days as required by GDPR.

authority.title: Data Protection Authority
authority.description: If you are not satisfied with our response or believe we are processing your data unlawfully, you have the right to lodge a complaint with your national data protection authority. Find your authority at:

footer.effective: This Privacy Policy is effective as of {date} and applies to all users of Oxyness.
